    com.install4j.api.context.UnattendedProgressInterface.isAskForProxy()
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.focusNextButton()
    use WizardContext.focusControlButton(ControlButtonType) with ControlButtonType.NEXT instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.pressCancelButton()
    use WizardContext.pressControlButton(ControlButtonType) with ControlButtonType.CANCEL instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.pressNextButton()
    use WizardContext.pressControlButton(ControlButtonType) with ControlButtonType.NEXT instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.pressPreviousButton()
    use WizardContext.pressControlButton(ControlButtonType) with ControlButtonType.PREVIOUS instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setBackButtonEnabled​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonEnabled(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.PREVIOUS instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setBackButtonVisible​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonVisible(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.PREVIOUS instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setCancelButtonEnabled​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonEnabled(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.CANCEL instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setCancelButtonText​(String)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonText(ControlButtonType, String) with ControlButtonType.CANCEL instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setCancelButtonVisible​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonVisible(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.CANCEL instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setNextButtonEnabled​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonEnabled(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.NEXT instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setNextButtonText​(String)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonText(ControlButtonType, String) with ControlButtonType.NEXT instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setNextButtonVisible​(boolean)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonVisible(ControlButtonType, boolean) with ControlButtonType.NEXT instead
    com.install4j.api.context.WizardContext.setPreviousButtonText​(String)
    use WizardContext.setControlButtonText(ControlButtonType, String) with ControlButtonType.PREVIOUS instead
    com.install4j.api.formcomponents.AbstractFormComponent.initalize()
    com.install4j.api.update.UpdateCheckRequest.askForProxy​(boolean)
    com.install4j.api.update.UpdateCheckRequest.isAskForProxy()
    com.install4j.api.update.UpdateCheckRequest.isShowProxyOnErrorCode()
    com.install4j.api.update.UpdateCheckRequest.showProxyOnErrorCode​(boolean)
    com.install4j.api.Util.getParentWindow()
    use UiUtil.getParentWindow() instead
    com.install4j.api.Util.isAdminUser()
    use Util.isAdminGroup() and Util.hasFullAdminRights() instead.
    com.install4j.api.Util.isAtLeastWindowsXP()
    com.install4j.api.Util.isWindows9X()
    always returns false because launchers do not work with Windows 9X anymore
    com.install4j.api.Util.isWindowsNT()
